short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Export Roll20 DnD 5e Character Sheet to PDF

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds an export button to the 5e character sheet of Roll20 games and exports the character sheet to an editable, savable, and printable form.

Will only work with one character sheet open at a time and currently only tested with DnD 5e Character Sheets
